LOM and PCIs Slots Settings

Figure 7-20 LOM and PCIs Slots

Table 7-11 LOM and PCIs Slots Parameters

Field Name

Description

All Onboard LOM Ports

All LOM ports are enabled or disabled.

Select Disabled, Enabled, or Platform Default.

LOM Port n OptionROM

The Option ROM is available on the LOM port designated by n. Select any of the following options:

 • Disabled

 • Enabled

 • UEFI-Only

 • Legacy-Only

 • Platform Default

PCIe Slot:SAS OptionROM

The Option ROM is available on the SAS port: Select any of the following options:

 • Disabled

 • Enabled

 • UEFI-Only

 • Legacy-Only

 • Platform Default

PCIe Slot:n Link Speed

This option allows you to restrict the maximum speed of an adapter card installed in PCIe slot n. Select any of the following options:

 • gen1

 • gen2

 • gen3

 • auto

 • disabled

 • Platform Default
